Package com.accoladehq.calendar.service

Class BookingServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.accoladehq.calendar.service.BookingServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
BookingService
@Service public class BookingServiceImpl extends Object implements BookingService
Implementation of BookingService for managing calendar owners, availability, and appointments.

      public void upsertOwnerIfNotExists(String username, String displayName)
      Creates or updates a calendar owner if it does not already exist.
      Specified by:
      upsertOwnerIfNotExists in interface BookingService
      Parameters:
      username - the unique username of the owner
      displayName - the display name for the owner (can be the same as username if null)

      Parameters:

    • searchAvailableSlots

      public List<SlotDto> searchAvailableSlots(SearchSlotsRequest req)
      Searches for available slots for a given owner and date.
      Specified by:
      searchAvailableSlots in interface BookingService
      Parameters:
      req - the search request containing username and date
      Returns:
      a list of SlotDto representing available slots

    • bookAppointment

      Books an appointment for the specified slot.
      Specified by:
      bookAppointment in interface BookingService
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • listUpcoming

      public List<Appointment> listUpcoming(String username)
      Lists all upcoming appointments for a given calendar owner.
      Specified by:
      listUpcoming in interface BookingService
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the calendar owner
      Returns:
      a list of Appointment sorted by date and start time
